dict.acceptation: （使）长大；使显老；使变老；使苍老；
[化学]老化；陈化，熟化；（吸毒者随年龄增长而主动）戒毒，戒除毒品；
[化学]使老化；使陈化；使熟化；估计，推测（马的年龄）；

sent.orig: Objective: To evaluate the clinical value of urinary protein routine agar gel electrophoresis (AGE) .
sent.trans: 目的：评价尿蛋白普通琼脂糖凝胶电泳(AGE)的临床价值。

sent.orig: Age after age shall be as age after age has been.
sent.trans: 将来世世代代如此，正如过去世世代代一样。

sent.orig: Person's biological age is young to age, but the person's mental age can be immortal.
sent.trans: 人的生物年龄固然有年轻年老，但人的心理年龄却可以长生不老。

sent.orig: My age was age of dreams, of beginnings, an age of noble hopes.
sent.trans: 我的年纪是梦想的年纪，开创的年纪，充满美好希望的年纪。

sent.orig: However,there is no significant difference between the age and sex,or calendar age and bone age.
sent.trans: 而在年龄、性别之间，以及生日年龄和骨骼年龄之间不存在显著性差异。
